content.webTitle: Wimbledon 2013: Order of play for Tuesday 2 July

fields.headline: Wimbledon 2013: Order of play for Tuesday 2 July
fields.bodyText: Centre Court 1pm A RADWANSKA (Pol, 4) v LI NA (Chn, 6); P KVITOVA (Cz, 8) v K FLIPKENS (Bel, 20) No1 Court 1pm S LISICKI (Ger, 23) v K Kanepi (Est); S STEPHENS (US, 17) v M BARTOLI (Fr, 15) No2 Court 11.30am R BOPANNA & EDOUARD ROGER-VASSELIN (I nd/Fr, 14) v R LINDSTEDT & D NESTOR (Swe/Can, 6); B SOARES & L RAYMOND (Br/US, 1) v F Polasek & J Husarova (Svk); T HUEY & R KOPS-JONES (Phi/US, 9) v J Peers & A Barty (Aus); M Bahrami & H Leconte (Iri/Fr) v J Bates & A Jarryd (GB/Swe) No3 Court 11.30am S ERRANI & R VINCI (It. 1) v J GOERGES & B ZAHLAVOVA STRYCOVA (Ger/Cz, 16); J BJORKMAN (Swe) & T WOODBRIDGE (Swe/Aus, 1) v G Rusedski & F Santoro (GB/Fr); P McNamara & P McNamee (Aus) v J McEnroe & P McEnroe (US)
